Text: Lithuanian National Revival, alternatively Lithuanian National Awakening (Lithuanian: "Lietuvių tautinis atgimimas" ), was a period of the history of Lithuania in the 19th century at the time when a major part of Lithuanian-inhabited areas belonged to the Russian Empire (the Russian partition of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth).
Triplets:<Lithuanian National Revival
2:
--------------------
Text: Lithuanian National Revival:  Most active participants of national revival were Vincas Kudirka, Jonas Basanavičius and others.
